meanings.sent2: Water moves intermolecularly through the cell membrane.
meanings.sent3: The molecules danced intermolecularly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The friendship between the molecules was intermolecularly strong.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flowers spread intermolecularly in the room.

meanings.definition: In a manner relating to interactions between molecules
meanings.sent1: The chemicals reacted intermolecularly to form a new compound.
meanings.sent2: Heat is transferred intermolecularly in the process.
meanings.sent3: The molecules communicated intermolecularly through vibrations.
meanings.sent4: The information was shared intermolecularly among the particles.
meanings.sent5: The energy flowed intermolecularly within the system.
